name: fast-vite-electron
description: Vite + Electron with esbuild, so fast! âš¡

scripts.dev: rimraf app/main app/render && cross-env NODE_ENV=development && vite
scripts.build: rimraf app/main app/render && cross-env NODE_ENV=development && vite build
scripts.pack:all: yarn run build && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder -c ./electron-builder.json --win --mac
scripts.pack:win: yarn run build && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder -c ./electron-builder.json --win
scripts.pack:mac: yarn run build && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder -c ./electron-builder.json --mac
